sentences.en: " I'll be progressive from now on,'she avowed.
sentences.cn: 偏她还变了口吻, 说:“以后我也要进步了. ”

sentences.en: A heavy progressive or graduated income tax.
a progressive reduction in the size of the workforce
Halsey was identified as a leading proponent of the values of progressive education.
sentences.cn: 哈尔西被认为是进步教育价值观的主要拥护者。

sentences.en: In the East the progressive revolt had a more decidedly urban complexion.
sentences.cn: 在东部,进步派的反叛带有更明显的城市色彩.

sentences.en: It was a progressive disease and he would suffer more and more.
sentences.cn: 病情逐渐加剧,他将忍受越来越大的痛苦.

sentences.en: Publicly he tried to be the world's most progressive businessman.
sentences.cn: 在表面上,他极力装作是世界最进步的企业家.

sentences.en: Some day all progressive mankind will cherish his memory.
sentences.cn: 有一天整个进步的人类都会敬仰他的英名.

sentences.en: The children go to a progressive school.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子在一所先进的学校念书。

sentences.en: The Republicans were deeply split between progressives and conservatives.
sentences.cn: 共和党进步派和保守派之间分歧很大。

sentences.en: There has been a progressive decrease in population every year in this city.
sentences.cn: 这个城市的人口在逐年递减.

sentences.en: There is often a progressive loss of sight in old age.
sentences.cn: 上了年纪的人视力逐步减退.

sentences.en: These weaknesses negated his otherwise progressive attitude towards the staff.
sentences.cn: 这些缺点抵消了他在其他方面对待员工还算开明的态度。

sentences.en: This is a progressive firm that uses the most modern systems.
sentences.cn: 这是一家使用非常现代化系统的先进企业.

sentences.en: Willan was able to point to the progressive changes he had already introduced.
sentences.cn: 维兰能够找出他已经采用的一些革新。

words.tran_cn: 前进的,发展的,完善中的

trans.tran_cn: 不断前进的，进步的，进行的
trans.tran_en: supporting new or modern ideas and methods, especially in politics and education
A progressive is someone who is progressive
